MonksSceneNavigation.click-to-view.name: Click to View
MonksSceneNavigation.click-to-view.hint: Click to view a scene rather than configure it.
MonksSceneNavigation.scene-indicator.hin: Add Icons to the Scene Item to show if it's active or if permissions have changed.
MonksSceneNavigation.folder-position.hin: Put the Scene folder at the start of the list, or at the back
